name: TheGovernorisTalking
0:
”Alexa, open The Governor is Talking”
”Alexa, Launch The Governor is Talking”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the governor is talking
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will alert you with an Alexa notification whenever New York State Governor Andrew Cuomo starts his daily press conference.

You can watch the Governor's conference live via his Facebook page at: https://www.facebook.com/GovernorAndrewCuomo/

You will also find there an archive of his past press conferences.

Note: This skill is not officilally affiliatted with Governor Cuomo or his office.

This skill was created and is being hosted by Witlingo. For more on witlingo, go to www.witlingo.com or send an email to contact@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
